channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black pen or spray tag about 0.3m x 0.3m on frontage of recently vacant Garden Cafe & Restaurant at 108-110 High St, Penge., 26th November
item.description:
Black pen or spray tag about 0.3m x 0.3m on frontage of recently vacant Garden Cafe & Restaurant at 108-110 High St, Penge. There is another spray tag on a shop front two doors away, but I forget which.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108 - 110, High Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very dirty roads, 26th November
item.description:
Wricklemarsh Road and the surrounding roads are extremely dirty with litter everywhere dog fouling on the pavement and have not been cleaned in months, I walk my dog regularly around these roads and I have never seen the area so dirty.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Corelli Road, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop E in Shortlands Rd, Shortlands, Bromley about 60m S of the traffic signal junction with Bromley Rd - the bus stop red/white circular letter identifier 'E' is no longer atop the bus stop flag, but sitting on a gravel topped wall immediately adjacent to the bus shelter., 26th November
item.description:
Bus stop E in Shortlands Rd, Shortlands, Bromley about 60m S of the traffic signal junction with Bromley Rd - the bus stop red/white circular letter identifier 'E' is no longer atop the bus stop flag, but sitting on a gravel topped wall immediately adjacent to the bus shelter. I suggest that you retrieve it before someone 'runs off with it'.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shortlands Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Too dark by night, 26th November
item.description:
Hi the lighting in lowestoft close goes off by night for some reason and it becomes scarely dark. it feels unsafe to walk there by night. please could you make sure the lights are working properly and also strong enough since without adequate its dangerou
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lowestoft Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 26th November
item.description:
Albion Road Multi-Storey Public Car Park, Albion Road, Bexleyheath: Please could you remove black graffiti from a brick wall and glass roof - both of which are located on the top floor level of this public car park. Please find the attached two pictures for context.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albion Road, Barnehurst, Greater London
